original_text: The Lord will continue to help you as his special people, as he has promised to do. But you must obey his commands. You must live in a way that pleases him.
korean_text: 여호와께서 네게 맹세하신 대로 너를 세워 자기의 성민이 되게 하시리니 이는 네가 네 하나님 여호와의 명령을 지켜 그 길로 행할 것임이니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord will continue to help you
as he has promised to do
But you must obey his commands
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 그의 명령을 순종해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: You must live in a way that pleases him
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그를 기쁘시게 하는 방식으로 살아야 합니다
